title: client crashing at loadingscreen
body: anyone else? it keeps repairing and then happens again

This is happening to me now EVERY DAY. The first game or two I try to play, everything is fine until loading screen. Then it shows a popup saying "You have disconnected from the server" and some other text. My client still is open, connected and I can chat with my friends. However every time i try to rejoin game it starts loading and then gives me the same error message. This has cost me multiple rank games LP now, when I literally had never lost more than 1 or 2 games in playing for over a year because of DC leaver loss (at the start of game). It's happened 5 days in the last week now that I disconnect from the server when the game is loading. It is not my internet as everything is still working fine, including as I said even the client messaging area. The game just refuses to load. I watched the same kind of thing happen to RTO in the twitch rivals competition yesterday and they lost a finals game because of it. Riot fix your servers please...
